name: Kubla Kahn
description:
Kubla Khan: or, A Vision in a Dream: A Fragment

A poem written by Samuel Taylor Coleridge, completed in 1797, and composed composed one night after he experienced an opium-influenced dream after reading a work describing the summer capital of a mongol emperor.

I've always loved this poem, since I first heard it referenced in a Douglas Adams book and found its dreamy half-recollection of a vision is beautiful and haunting .

So I present to you, a narrated version with visuals dreamed up by machine learning -  hope you enjoy!  Let me know your thoughts or favorite poems / poets in the comments!

Consider supporting me on Patreon - to support independent game development and receive a monthly dose of games/experiments like this as well as supporting the development of Project Voidcraft - which you should totally add to your wishlist.
